description: Bug #2 FIX COMPLETE: Vector store reload mechanism verified. Full test suite passes (1747/1747 tests, 0 failures, 49 ignored). Implementation adds timestamp-based staleness detection: semantic search checks if on-disk hnsw_index.hnsw.graph is newer than in-memory load_time, automatically reloads if stale. Changes: (1) VectorStore.load_time field tracks when HNSW loaded, (2) load_hnsw_index() records SystemTime::now(), (3) semantic_search_impl() checks mtime vs load_time before each search, reloads atomically with write lock if needed. Zero regressions confirmed. Users can now run manual reindex and see fresh semantic results WITHOUT restart. Ready for production.
